name: Broken Ties
description: King Kalavant wishes to eradicate all races other than humans. You have been forced to flee from your home, and must seek out others to help you stop the eradication of the world at the hands of The New Order.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 4 GB NVIDIA GTX 680 M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 568 MB available space Sound Card: Generic Speakers should do. Additional Notes: Lots of Processing and Graphics not needed.
